fields.name: Headline
fields.default:
TALENT GOT YOU HERE.
IT WON'T GET YOU THERE.

fields.name: Subheadline
fields.default: You've always been the best in your circle. But the gap between "good" and "world-class" is a chasm that ambition alone can't cross.

default.title: Your prime years are burning.
default.description: You're grinding without expert direction. Every month of unfocused training is a month your competitors are pulling ahead.

default.title: Programs don't build podiums.
default.description: Cookie-cutter plans from the internet were never designed for someone chasing world-class. You need a system, not a spreadsheet.

default.title: Your body is ready. Your mind isn't.
default.description: You crumble when it counts. The mental demands of elite competition require training as deliberate as your physical prep.
